Pilot rescued from Tasman Bay after ‘ditching’ aircraft in water off Nelson coast https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-unfolding-aviation-incident-at-tasman-bay-near-nelson/BZ4PVY52UJAZPJGKYPAMNPVQAQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-unfolding-aviation-incident-at-tasman-bay-near-nelson/BZ4PVY52UJAZPJGKYPAMNPVQAQ/ It's understood a NZDF aircraft and multiple helicopters are involved. Tue, 19 Nov 2024 08:14:02 +0000 Emergency services, including a NZDF aircraft, are involved in an emergency operation tonight at Tasman Bay near Nelson.
State Highway 1 Tokoroa to Ātiamuri to partially reopen this week https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-1-tokoroa-to-atiamuri-to-partially-reopen-this-week/5OQ3I2VIFZHBXLRISNTVVKIUFE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/state-highway-1-tokoroa-to-atiamuri-to-partially-reopen-this-week/5OQ3I2VIFZHBXLRISNTVVKIUFE/ 'We lost four days of work since we started work in this area, all because of rain.' Tue, 19 Nov 2024 07:40:45 +0000 Closing the SH1 Tokoroa to upper Ātiamuri section has enabled three days’ work to be completed in one day.
Nelson mental health worker suffers serious burns in boiling water attack by patient https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-mental-health-worker-suffers-serious-burns-in-boiling-water-attack-by-病人/LJY2HCUTIRBBTN3SS2TSRIZAM4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-mental-health-worker-suffers-serious-burns-in-boiling-water-attack-by-病人/LJY2HCUTIRBBTN3SS2TSRIZAM4/ Tracy NealDerive McNeill has since thanked the man for working in the mental health sector. Tue, 19 Nov 2024 07:00:00 +0000 A mental health worker received burns to his face when an inpatient threw a cup of boiling water at him. Photo / 123RF
Hīkoi to Parliament: Tens of thousands descend on Wellington in historic day of mass protest https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hikoi-to-parliament-live-updates-thousands-descend-on-wellington-in-historic-day-of-mass-protest/HGI2Z5XVYBCXVHNDGPSFGWPFBQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hikoi-to-parliament-live-updates-thousands-descend-on-wellington-in-historic-day-of-mass-protest/HGI2Z5XVYBCXVHNDGPSFGWPFBQ/ As the crowd chanted, Seymour walked back into the Beehive with his MPs. Young diver Jade Kahukore-Dixon fatally attacked by shark near Chatham Islands, community in shock https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/diver-attacked-by-shark-in-chatham-islands/4QN5YPFMZBC2FKYSMX653QXH24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/diver-attacked-by-shark-in-chatham-islands/4QN5YPFMZBC2FKYSMX653QXH24/ The victim has been described as 'an amazing boy' who loved fishing and diving. Tue, 19 Nov 2024 05:55:21 +0000 Commercial diver Jade Kahukore-Dixon, 24, was killed by a shark today near the Chatham Islands. He was brought back to Waitangi Wharf before being rushed to hospital.
